settings.retail_sub_heading: Be the first one to know
settings.retail_text: Welcome to the Ghost Gang! Our retail and budtender partners are our family. This exclusive mailing list is for retail store owners and employees only. Sign up for private and early access to information, events, merchandise & more.

settings.heading: What provinces are your products available in?
settings.row_content: Ghost Drops products are currently available via retail partners in Ontario, British Columbia, Saskatchewan, Northwest Territories, Manitoba and New Brunswick.

settings.heading: Do you do in-store pop-ups?
settings.row_content: Yes, we selectively choose retailers to partner with. Reach out tosales@ghostdrops.com to schedule a pop-up and learn more.

settings.heading: How do the collectible trading cards work?
settings.row_content: The majority of 3.5g jar shipments from Ghost Drops to cannabis retailers come with accompanying collectible trading cards that visually represent our iconic strains. These cards are to be distributed by budtenders to consumers with purchase of Ghost Drops 3.5g jars (1 jar = 1 collectible card). These cards can be registered online for access to exclusive benefits. Our special 1-in-100 holographic cards can be redeemed for a special merchandise prize package.Find out more information here.

settings.heading: How do I order your products?
settings.row_content:
If in Ontario, MB, BC or NWT - contact your local provincial wholesaler of cannabis. Ontario = Ontario Cannabis Store. BC = British Columbia Liquor Distribution Board. NWT = NTLCC. Manitoba = LGCA.

If in Saskatchewan, contact Valiant Distribution.

New Brunswick is distributed exclusively by the provincial government to government-owned stores.

settings.heading: Do you offer in-store displays?
settings.row_content: Yes. To request displays and learn more, please reach out tosales@ghostdrops.com.

settings.heading: Do you have merchandise or swag we can order?
settings.row_content: Please contact us atsales@ghostdrops.com for more information.

settings.heading: FAQ
settings.subheading: You got questions, we got answers
